emailVerification.title: UTFG - Email Verification
emailVerification.content:
Please click on the following link to verify your email address:
{url}

resetPassword.title: Password Reset
resetPassword.content:
Please click on the following link to reset your password:
{url}
resetPassword.buttonInvalid: If the button above cannot be clicked, please copy this address to your browser's address bar
resetPassword.emailReason: You are receiving this email because a password reset was requested for this email in the UTFG registration system. If you have any questions, please contact the UTFG official organizers.
resetPassword.subject: Reset Password
resetPassword.requestRecevied: We have received your request to reset your password for the UTFG registration system. Please reset your password via the button below.

verification.subject: Email Verification
verification.title: Email Verification
verification.requestRecevied: We received your request to sign up for the UTFG registration system. Please verify your email address by clicking the button below.
verification.buttonInvalid: If the button above cannot be clicked, please copy this address to your browser's address bar
verification.emailReason: You are receiving this email because your email address was used to register for an account in the UTFG registration system. If you have any questions, please contact the official organizers of UTFG.

sms.smsVerification: Hello, your UTFG registration system validation code is: {code}
sms.verification: Hello, your UTFG registration system verification code is: {code}

messages.resetPasswordRequestReceived: If the email address is in our database, you will receive a reset letter shortly.
messages.userEditBasicInfoNotice: To edit basic information, please contact us using the official Email.

errors.emailOrPasswordIncorrect: Wrong email or password, please check and re-enter
errors.userDisabled: Your account has been deactivated, please contact UTFG Official
errors.emailNotVerified: Your email address has not been verified, please check your inbox for the verification email
errors.phoneNotVerified: Your cell phone number has not been verified, please refer to your email inbox to receive the verification email
errors.authSystemError: System error, please try again later
errors.refreshTokenInvalid: Your login has expired, please login again
errors.duplicateUserEmail: This email address is already taken
errors.duplicateUserPhone: This phone number is already taken
errors.emailVerificationTokenExpired: Verification link expired, please request a new verification email
errors.smsVerificationTokenExpired: Verification code expired, please request a new verification messages
errors.passwordResetTokenExpired: Password reset link, please request a new password reset
errors.groupUserAlreadyExists: This user is already in the group
errors.userPermissionAlreadyExists: This user already has the permission
errors.groupPermissionAlreadyExists: This group already has the permission
errors.userInternalLabelAlreadyExists: This user internal label already exists
errors.oldPasswordIncorrent: The password change failed, old password incorrect
errors.smsVerificationAttemptsExceeded: You've requested the maximum number of phone verification codes today, please try again later
errors.passwordResetAttemptsExceeded: You've requested the maximum number of password resets today, please try again later
errors.userNotFoundOrVerified: This user cannot be found, or this user has been verified
errors.emailVerificationAttemptsExceeded: You've requested the maximum number of email verifications today, please try again later
errors.userEmailInBlacklist: This email has been deactivated, please contact UTFG official
errors.userPhoneInBlacklist: This cell phone number has been deactivated, please contact UTFG Official
errors.passwordLengthIncorrect: Password should be longer than 8 characters
errors.oauthExists: This third-party account has already been used, if you want to link to this account, please unbind it first, or use another account to link to it
errors.oauthNotExists: This third-party account is not yet linked, please register or bind it first
errors.oauthFailed: Third-party login failed. Please try again later
errors.oauthAlreadyBound: You have already bound to this service, please unbind it first
errors.oauthNotBound: You are not yet bound to this service

user.userIdentificationNumber: Last 5 digits of the Passport Number

succeed.description: You have successfully registered with the UTFG registration system
succeed.title: Verification succeeded

pending.description: Please verify your email address before using the UTFG registration system
pending.title: Please verify your email

phoneVerification.description: We have sent an SMS verification code to your cell phone, please enter your verification code here.
phoneVerification.title: Verify your cell phone number

recaptchaCheck.iAmNotRobot: Dragon-friendlier like me could not be a robot placeholder

resetPassword.passwordLengthDescription: Password must be at least 8 characters

registrationSuccessful.title: Registration Success
registrationSuccessful.description: You have completed registration with the UTFG registration system
